changeSet.author: fineract
changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql = "SELECT CASE WHEN (${loanProductId} = 2) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) <= 200) THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 2) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) BETWEEN 201 AND 500) THEN 'YELLOW' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 2) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) > 500) THEN 'RED' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 9) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) <= 200) THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 9) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) BETWEEN 201 AND 500) THEN 'YELLOW' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 9) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) > 500) THEN 'RED' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 8) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) <= 200) THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 8) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) BETWEEN 201 AND 500) THEN 'YELLOW' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 8) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) > 500) THEN 'RED' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 4) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) <= 60) THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 4) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) > 60) THEN 'ORANGE' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 5) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) <= 60) THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 5) AND (IFNULL(${percentageIncrease}, 0) > 60) THEN 'ORANGE' END AS color FROM m_client mc WHERE mc.id = ${clientId} GROUP BY mc.id" WHERE report_name = "Increase percentage Policy Check";

changeSet.author: fineract
changeSet.sql: DELETE mcci FROM m_client_contact_info mcci WHERE mcci.id IN ( SELECT x.id FROM ( SELECT ci.* FROM m_client_contact_info ci GROUP BY ci.client_id HAVING COUNT(ci.client_id ) > 1 )x );

changeSet.sql: INSERT IGNORE INTO m_code_value (code_id, code_value, code_description, order_position, code_score, is_active, is_mandatory) VALUES((SELECT mc.id FROM m_code mc WHERE mc.code_name = 'Document Type' LIMIT 1), 'Fotografias', 'Fotografias', 1, NULL, 1, 0);

changeSet.author: fineract
changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql= "SELECT CASE WHEN (${loanProductId} = 2) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 3) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 4) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 5) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 6) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 7) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 8) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 9) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' WHEN (${loanProductId} = 10) AND ${numberOfDocuments} > 1 THEN 'GREEN' ELSE 'RED' END AS color FROM m_client mc WHERE mc.id = ${clientId}" WHERE report_name = "Mandatory to attach photographs and investment plan Policy Check";
